runExtract.description: Run an extract/workflow on an uploaded document

props.name: document_id
props.description: The unique identifier of the document to parse

props.name: template_id
props.description: The unique identifier of the Workflow/template to use

props.name: use_ocr
props.description: Enable OCR processing (required for gpt-3.5-turbo or OCR-related parameters)

props.name: query_model
props.description: The AI model to use for parsing

props.name: detect_tables
props.description: Detect tables in the document (requires use_ocr=true)

props.name: chunk_by_pages
props.description: Number of pages per segment for method 1 segmentation

props.name: start_regex
props.description: Regex pattern for where parsing should begin (requires use_ocr=true)

props.name: end_regex
props.description: Regex pattern for where parsing should end (requires use_ocr=true)

props.name: split_regex
props.description: Regex pattern to split the document into sections (requires use_ocr=true)

props.name: use_all_matches
props.description: Use all regex matches instead of just the first (requires use_ocr=true)

uploadDocument.description: Uploads a document to a DocumentPro parser

props.name: file
props.description: The document file to upload (PDF, JPEG, PNG, or TIFF, max 6MB)

newDocument.description: Triggers when a new document is uploaded to DocumentPro
